quote: The deeper the truth in a creative work, the longer it will live.   – Charlie Chaplin
fact: "I am." is the shortest complete sentence in the English language.
joke: I was at the library and asked if they have any books on "paranoia", the librarian replied, "yes, they are right behind you"
